subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: moderator
msgSnippet: Thanks for responding.  I appreciate your offer, and I believe this will enable us to offer faster service to new members so they don t get discouraged when
messageBody:
Thanks for responding. I appreciate your offer, and I believe this will
enable us to offer faster service to new members so they don't get
discouraged when their new post isn't listed right away. I'll set you
up as a moderator.

Paige

tinyallen wrote:

> I'd be willing to help moderate. I've been doing so in the
> Handryting group for a while now, if you need a reference.
>
> My browser (Firefox, shameless plug) allows me to open multiple
> tabbed pages as 'Home Page'; this means I'll take a quick look once a
> day, and usually twice.
>
> Chaos Prevails! But I should help hold down the average response
> time, anyway.
>
> --- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Paige Gabhart" <pgabhart@a...>
> wrote:
> > Due to the problems we were beginning to have with spam a short time
> <snip>
> > If there is someone in the group who would be willing to serve as a
> > moderator to insure that new posts are legitimate and not the
> <clip>
